t: The New York Hustle of Amazon’s Second Headquarters | The New Yorker
s: November 17, 2018 - There is an opportunity cost to luring Jeff Bezos, the world’s richest man, to Long Island City by letting him free-ride on the public services that other New Yorkers must pay for.Photograph by Hiroko Masuike / NYT /Redux ... The city of hustlers got hustled.
